src:
Diuji 2 Hari, Tol Kunciran-Serpong Ditargetkan Operasi Bulan Ini
04 Nov 2019, 16:00 by Trio Hamdani


Proyek Tol JORR 2 Kunciran-Serpong/Foto: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta - Badan Pengatur Jalan Tol (BPJT) Kementerian PUPR menargetkan Tol JORR 2 Ruas Kunciran-Serpong bakal beroperasi November ini. Saat ini tol tersebut sedang dilakukan proses uji laik fungsi.Dikutip detikcom dari siaran pers PT Jasa Marga (Persero) Tbk, Senin (4/11/2019), proses uji laik dilaksanakan selama dua hari ke depan yang dimulai sejak hari ini, 4 November hingga 5 November 2019.Pekerjaan fisik Tol JORR 2 Ruas Kunciran-Serpong sudah rampung 100% pada 30 September 2019, yang dikelola oleh PT Marga Trans Nusantara (PT MTN), kelompok usaha PT Jasa Marga (Persero) Tbk.Presiden Direktur PT MTN Truly Nawangsasi menjelaskan setelah Tol JORR 2 Ruas Kunciran-Serpong lulus uji laik fungsi maka akan segera beroperasi."Jika nantinya lulus uji laik dan segera beroperasi, Jalan Tol JORR 2 Ruas Kunciran-Serpong akan terhubung dengan sejumlah jalan tol lainnya, seperti Jalan Tol Ruas Jakarta-Tangerang, Jalan Tol Ruas Pondok Aren-Serpong, Jalan Tol Ruas Cengkareng-Batuceper-Kunciran, dan Jalan Tol Ruas Cinere-Serpong," jelas Truly, dikutip dari keterangan tertulis Jasa Marga, Senin (4/11/2019).Dia menjelaskan, jalan bebas hambatan ini nantinya dapat memecah lalu lintas yang menumpuk di dalam Kota Jakarta maupun JORR yang berbatasan dengan Jakarta."Jalan Tol JORR 2 Ruas Kunciran-Serpong dapat menjadi alternatif bagi pengguna jalan yang hendak ke arah Bandara Soekarno-Hatta, arah Pondok Aren-Serpong, serta arah Tangerang-Merak. Sehingga dengan adanya Jalan Tol JORR 2 Ruas Kunciran-Serpong bisa memberikan dampak positif bagi kelancaran distribusi barang melalui Pelabuhan Merak," tambahnya.Jalan Tol JORR 2 Ruas Kunciran-Serpong sepanjang 11,135 Km terbagi atas dua paket pekerjaan, yaitu Paket 1 Ruas Kunciran-Parigi sepanjang 6,711 Km dan Paket 2 Ruas Parigi-Serpong sepanjang 4,424 Km.Kepala BPJT Kementerian PUPR Danang Parikesit, sebelumnya mengatakan bahwa tol ini ditargetkan beroperasi November, bersamaan dengan Tol Pandaan-Malang seksi 4 Singosari-Pakis (5,1 km)."Kedua ruas tol tersebut (Kunciran-Serpong dan Singosari-Pakis) ditargetkan November 2019 bisa beroperasi," ujar Danang dikutip dari laman resmi Sekretariat Kabinet, Senin (12/8/2019). Simak Video " Menilik Jalan Tol Pertama di Kalimantan"[Gambas:Video 20detik](toy/dna)
text:
Tested for 2 Days, Kunciran-Serpong Toll Road is Targeted to Operate This Month
04 Nov 2019, 16:00 by Trio Hamdani


JORR 2 Kunciran-Serpong Toll Road Project / Photo: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta - The Toll Road Regulatory Agency (BPJT) of the PUPR Ministry is targeting the JORR 2 Toll Road Kunciran-Serpong to be operational this November. At present the toll road is undergoing a functional feasibility test process. Quoted by AFP from a press release of PT Jasa Marga (Persero) Tbk, Monday (11/04/2019), the feasibility testing process is carried out for the next two days starting from today, November 4 until 5 November 2019. The physical work of JORR 2 Toll Road Kunciran-Serpong Section has been completed 100% on 30 September 2019, managed by PT Marga Trans Nusantara (PT MTN), a business group of PT Jasa Marga (Persero) Tbk. President Director of PT MTN Truly Nawangsasi explained that after the JORR 2 Toll Road, Kunciran-Serpong Section passes the functional feasibility test, it will immediately operate. "If later it passes the feasibility test and immediately operates, the JORR 2 Toll Road Kunciran-Serpong Section will be connected to a number of other toll roads, such as the Jakarta Toll Road "Tangerang, Pondok Aren-Serpong Toll Road, Cengkareng-Batuceper-Kunciran Toll Road, and Cinere-Serpong Toll Road," explained Truly, quoted from Jasa Marga's written statement on Monday (11/04/2019). , freeway s this obstacle can later break up the traffic that has accumulated inside the City of Jakarta and JORR which borders Jakarta. "JORR 2 Toll Road Kunciran-Serpong Section can be an alternative for road users who want to go to Soekarno-Hatta Airport, to Pondok Aren-Serpong , and the Tangerang-Peacock direction. So with the JORR 2 Toll Road, Kunciran-Serpong Section can have a positive impact on the smooth distribution of goods through the Port of Merak, "he added. JORR 2 Toll Road Section Kunciran-Serpong along 11,135 Km is divided into two work packages, namely Package 1 Kunciran-Parigi Section 6,711 Km and Package 2 of the 4,424 Km Parigi-Serpong Section. Head of BPJT Ministry of PUPR Danang Parikesit, previously said that this toll road is targeted to operate in November, together with Pandaan-Malang Section 4 Singosari-Pakis Toll Road (5.1 km). The toll roads (Kunciran-Serpong and Singosari-Pakis) are targeted to be operational in November 2019, "Danang said, quoted from the official Cabinet Secretariat website, Monday (08/12/2019). See Video" Viewing the First Toll Road in Kalimantan "[Gambas: 20sec video] (toy / dna)
